import React,{useState}from"react";import Home from"./Components/home/home";import TicketManagement from"./Components/TicketManagement";import AuthContainer from"./Auth/AuthContainer";import Payment from"./Components/payment/Payment";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[isAuthenticated,setIsAuthenticated]=useState(false);const[currentPage,setCurrentPage]=useState("home");const handleLoginSuccess=()=>{setIsAuthenticated(true);setCurrentPage("ticketManagement");};const renderPage=()=>{switch(currentPage){case"home":return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{setCurrentPage:setCurrentPage});// Truyền `setCurrentPage` vào đây
